title: Watch: Bus Driver Who Shuttled Illegals from Texas Traumatized After Buses Vandalized by Chicago Locals Fed Up with Invasion
text: Terms of Service DMCA Advertise with us Affiliates Media Inquiries About Featured A bus driver who transported illegal aliens from Texas to Chicago says he won’t make the trek again after angry Windy City residents attacked his bus and made him fear for his life. Speaking to journalist Hernando Arce, the driver named Jerrod recalled coming under attack as he made the trip with other buses while working for a “big company.” “So when we got to Chicago to drop them off, that’s when all the bad happened. Chicago… they start to vandalize. There were so many broken windows, so many…um. I’m surprised i didn’t get a flat tire,” the driver said. “That was my only trip – first and last,” the man said, adding other buses were also vandalized. “Everyone that went to Chicago, their buses got vandalized,” Jerrod recounted, saying Chicago drivers would actively pursue the buses. “I was scared for my life and that’s why I didn’t want to do it no more,” he said. The driver’s harrowing experience illustrates how residents of Chicago are [growing outraged](https://www.infowars.com/posts/no-more-blue-no-matter-who-fed-up-chicago-residents-turn-on-democrats-at-city-council-meeting/) by illegal immigrants being shipped into their communities. posted 6 hours ago posted 6 hours ago posted 9 hours ago posted 9 hours ago
